segments.text: I need a snack from the cafeteria .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you thinking of getting ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I may get something too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you plan on buying ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a sweet tooth . I want candy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of candy do you want ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of chocolate do you want ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I either want a Snickers or a Kit Kat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The cafeteria doesn't sell Kit Kats .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I guess I'll just get a Snickers .
segments.speaker: S2
